alert.note: Alert for Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 23 at 9:22PM CDT until August 29 at 9:35AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Mississippi, including the following county, Marion. * WHEN...Through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Waves of heavy rain will continue to move through the region tonight into Wednesday, resulting in continued saturation of grounds and potential for flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
